title: Low FPS in Ascension
body:
I'm not sure if it's a bug, but I'm having significantly lower fps in Ascension (fluctuating around 20) than on Summoner's Rift (pretty much flat 60).

I play on a mac, but it's worked perfectly fine for everything before now.

replies.body: Yeah, I am having this same issue on ascension alone.  Right when one can tp into the map my FPS drops all the way to 15 - 20 from around 100. I have to exit the game and reconnect to fix the issue. :/. I hope this can get fixed.
i will try this - (having same issue)
